title.narrative: SSC on Food Safety between DK + Vietnam Phase II
Improved framework conditions for sustainable development

description.narrative:
SSC contributions in 2019 to framework conditions within food safety in Vietnam: "4 ".
Score from 1-5, 1 lowest and 5 highest.
The planned output targets in the project have been met in 2019.
The project has had substantial and direct influence on the development of the legal framework for feed management and veterinary drug management in Vietnam. In 2019, the SSC-partners worked closely together on the development of legislation to implement the feed management chapter in the 2018 Animal Husbandry Law. In addition, the SSC partners cooperated on the further development of the Circular on Prescription of veterinary medicine, and preparations were made for an impact analysis of the planned legislative changes to map the expected impact of the new law on public and private stakeholders.
